channel.title: Pk points losing and gaining

item.title: Pk points losing and gaining
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Laughing my fucking ass out.

Do you know what you are talking about?

Retard it is applydead. Pkpoints = 1 etc applies only to players not npcs. Putting pkpoints -= 1 minus’s your pk points by 1 everytime the player dies from another player. There isn’t another place in client.java pertaining to dieing like applydead. If you don’t believe me, try it

Read full topic

item.title: Pk points losing and gaining
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

Hey lal moparscape viewers,

so what i want is that if someone kills someone in wild the person who wins gets a kill count. which i call pk point sin my serv, but i need help with making the person he died losing a point. any help??

here is my coding to make person gain one.

client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
if(killerz != null && PlayerHandler.players[KillerId] != null) {
  PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].pkpoints += lnew;
  PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].killcount += 1;
  otherpkps = PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].pkpoints;
  otherkillc = PlayerHandler.players[KillerId].killcount;
  killerz.sendMessage("You kill your opponent, and receive 1 player kill.");
  killerz.sendMessage("You now have a total of "+otherkillc+" player kills.");
  deathcount =+ 1;
}
}

Please Help??

Read full topic
